entry.reasoning: • **Shanti Parva 22.1** • Proof: *मद्विधानेन विहिता मम देहविहारिणः* • The verse states that souls are guided by the Lord's order. • Kings and warriors are not mentioned as guides; the Lord alone is the ultimate guide.
